title: 'Ida' Director Made Film To 'Recover The Poland' Of His Childhood
teaser: The film is set in 1962 in Poland where director Pawel Pawlikowski lived until he was 14. Up for an Oscar for best foreign language film, Ida is about identity, faith, guilt and socialism.
